law.catch_line: Subsequent issue of bonds for additions and improvements.
law.text: Any city acquiring a municipal hospital under the provisions of KRS 216.100 to 216.220 may provide for additions to and improvements of the hospital by an additional issue of bonds in the same manner as the original bonds.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3235i-15.
